game.name: Cats Hidden in Georgia
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Georgia 전역에 숨겨진 귀여운 고양이 100마리를 찾아보세요! 이 귀엽고 손으로 그린 숨은그림찾기 게임은 원조 바이럴 ‘숨은 고양이’ 게임의 창작자 Travellin Cats가 만들었습니다! 전부 찾을 수 있을까요?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Find 100 cats hidden across Georgia in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game by Travellin Cats - the original viral hidden cats game creator! Can you find them all?

reviewHighlights.text: Going to remove the game for now, and move on to the next kitty hunt. Before I do, I'd like to recommend this game. :) It's like the other cat seeking...
I wish I had the option for a neutral review, because that is what I would leave. There is absolutely nothing wrong with Cats Hidden in Georgia, but i...
